actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the purpose of assuring that a certain percentage of the funds allocated under section 106 of such act is distributed to units of general local government, other than metropolitan cities and urban counties, and to States for use in metropolitan areas.

summary.text: Provides under the Housing and Community Development Act that not less than 5 percent of the 80 percent allocated by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development for Community Development Programs shall be allocated as of fiscal year 1976 to units of general local government.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the purpose of assuring that a certain percentage of the funds allocated under section 106 of such act is distributed to units of general local government, other than metropolitan cities and urban counties, and to States for use in metropolitan areas.
